title: Saffron Barket quits Strictly Come Dancing rehearsals after back pain
text:
Poor Saffron, get better soon! (Picture: @Saffronbarker)

Strictly Come Dancing contestant Saffron Barker has been forced to quit rehearsals after injuring her back on Saturday night’s show.

The 20-year-old YouTuber took to Instagram to update fans on rehearsals with dance partner AJ Pritchard as she admitted she’s found it difficult to work through the pain.

The star, who is set to perform the Foxtrot to Frank Sinatra’s New York, New York on Saturday, cast doubt over her next performance by revealing she’s unable to dance or sleep as she has ‘crippling back pain’.

The injury took place during Saturday night’s Contemporary dance performance.

In a clip from training, she said: ‘I’m actually in so much pain. I really hurt my back on Saturday. We actually can’t get through today. We can’t do it.’

AJ added: ‘No, it’s going well. It’s just that we have to do specific points. There’s a lot of cane work in there which is amazing but we are just being sensible.’

The YouTuber took to Instagram to tell her fans (Picture: @saffronbarker)

AJ said despite her injury rehearsals are going well (Picture: @saffronbarker)

Later on the in the evening, the star updated her followers on social media.

Advertisement

Advertisement

She said: ‘The pain in my back is just keeping me up all night.’

The next day, the YouTube star appeared to take matters into her own hands by enlisting the help of Deep Heat – a treatment for injury and pain.

Saffron is hoping Deep Heat will help her ‘crippling pain’ (Picture:@saffronbarker)

Alongside a snap of the ointment, she wrote: ‘Got both but anyone know if heat pads of deep heat is better for my back? In absolute bits.’

This isn’t the first time Saffron has taken a knock as AJ previously admitting to slapping the star round the face during rehearsals.

Speaking to hosts Phillip Schofield and Holly Willoughby about the BBC show, the pair- who have sparked dating rumours – discussed how one rehearsal had gone particularly wrong.

Holly said to Saffron: ‘You are suffering for this aren’t you? You’re covered in bruises, he slapped you around the face.’

‘He did slap me around the face, yes,’ Saffron confirmed.

Holly asked: ‘What happened there then?’

‘Not on purpose, obviously not on purpose,’ AJ clarified.

Strictly Come Dancing airs on Saturday evenings on BBC One.

description: Saffron Barket quits Strictly Come Dancing rehearsals after 'crippling back pain' from Saturday night's dance routine
